SEARCH
Package com.illiasalohub.movieapp.views

Class MainView

java.lang.Object
com.illiasalohub.movieapp.views.MainView
public class MainView extends Object
The main user interface class for interacting with users in the movie manager application. This class handles all user inputs and displays related to movie management tasks.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MainView()
    Constructs a MainView and initializes its StatisticsView.

  • Method Details

    • displayWelcomeMessage

      public void displayWelcomeMessage()
      Displays the initial welcome message and options to the user.

    • getInitialUserInput

      public int getInitialUserInput()
      Prompts for and returns the initial user choice to continue or quit.
      Returns:
      the user's choice as an integer

    • displayStartMenu

      public void displayStartMenu()
      Displays the main menu of options related to movie management.

    • displayAllMoviesActionMenu

      public void displayAllMoviesActionMenu()
      Displays the menu for actions related to all movies.

    • displayStatisticsMenu

      public void displayStatisticsMenu()
      Displays the statistics menu with options for different statistical data.

    • statisticDisplay

      public StatisticsView statisticDisplay()
      Returns the instance of StatisticsView associated with this view.
      Returns:
      the statistics view object

    • getUserInput

      public int getUserInput()
      Prompts the user for a choice and returns it.
      Returns:
      the user's choice as an integer

    • promptNewMovie

      public Movie promptNewMovie()
      Prompts the user for details to create a new Movie object.
      Returns:
      a new Movie object or null if the user decides to quit

    • getMovieYear

      public int getMovieYear()
      Prompts the user to enter the release year of the movie, ensuring it is valid based on the first movie year.
      Returns:
      the year entered by the user if it is valid

    • readIntSafe

      public int readIntSafe()
      Helper method to safely read an integer from the user input.
      Returns:
      the integer entered by the user, ensuring it is a valid number

    • getStatusFromChoice

      public Statuses getStatusFromChoice()
      Prompts the user to select a movie status from predefined options.
      Returns:
      the status chosen by the user

    • processRating

      public double processRating()
      Prompts the user to enter a movie rating between 1 and 10.
      Returns:
      the rating entered by the user

    • displayMovies

      public void displayMovies(List<Movie> movies)
      Displays a list of movies with details.
      Parameters:
      movies - the list of movies to display

    • promptForMovieId

      public int promptForMovieId()
      Prompts the user for a movie ID to be edited.
      Returns:
      the ID entered by the user

    • displayMovie

      public void displayMovie(Movie movie)
      Displays detailed information about a specific movie.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie to display details for; if null, a message indicating no movie found is displayed

    • getEditChoice

      public int getEditChoice(Movie movie)
      Prompts the user to choose a field of the movie to edit.
      Parameters:
      movie - the movie whose fields are potential candidates for editing
      Returns:
      the user's choice corresponding to the field they want to edit

    • getNewValue

      public String getNewValue(String field)
      Prompts the user for a new value for a specific field.
      Parameters:
      field - the field for which to input a new value
      Returns:
      the new value as entered by the user

    • getFilterChoice

      public int getFilterChoice()
      Prompts the user to choose a field by which to filter the movies.
      Returns:
      the user's choice corresponding to the filter criteria

    • getFilterValue

      public String getFilterValue()
      Prompts the user for a value to use as a filter.
      Returns:
      the filter value as a string

    • getYearRange

      public int[] getYearRange()
      Prompts the user to enter a range of years for filtering.
      Returns:
      an array where the first element is the start year and the second is the end year

    • getRatingRange

      public double[] getRatingRange()
      Prompts the user to enter a range for movie ratings.
      Returns:
      an array where the first element is the minimum rating and the second is the maximum rating

    • getOrderChoice

      public int getOrderChoice()
      Prompts the user to select a field by which to order movies.
      Returns:
      the user's choice as an integer corresponding to the field to order by

    • getSortOrder

      public boolean getSortOrder()
      Prompts the user to select the sort order for displaying movies.
      Returns:
      true if the user chooses ascending order, false if descending

    • setDisplayType

      public void setDisplayType()
      Allows the user to set the display type for listing movies. The display type can be a detailed list format or a compact paragraph format.

    • promptForMovieIdToDelete

      public int promptForMovieIdToDelete()
      Prompts the user for the ID of the movie they want to delete.
      Returns:
      the ID of the movie to be deleted as entered by the user
